alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 2:33PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Delta and west central Gunnison Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 232 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crawford, or 25 miles northeast of Montrose, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Delta and west central Gunnison Counties. This includes Colorado 92 between mile markers 31 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
